game.title: The Missing Amulet
game.objective: Find the lost amulet of Elvenking.
game.description: The Amulet of Elvenking is a priceless heirloom stolen by the renegade dark elf wizard Zordrax. Find and return the amulet to the Elvenking to restore balance to the forest.
game.reward: Elvenking's Favor, 1000 gold, Ancient Elven Sword

task.objective: Talk to the forest ranger, Erebos.
task.description: Seek out the forest ranger, Erebos, and inquire about the whereabouts of the amulet. He may have some leads to help you begin your search.

task.objective: Find the ruins of the ancient temple.
task.description: From the forest ranger, learn about the temple in the Eastern Forest. Locate and explore these ruins.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian of the temple.
task.description: Battle the temple guardian to claim the amulet.

task.objective: Return the amulet to the Elvenking.
task.description: Present the recovered artifact at Elvenking's Court for reward and praise.
